script: powershell -Command "$release_version = 'latest.v-sekai-editor-273'; $base_templates_dir = \"$env:APPDATA\Godot\export_templates\"; $temp_dir = \"$base_templates_dir\.tmp_$release_version\"; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $temp_dir -Force; $templates_url = \"https://github.com/V-Sekai/world-godot/releases/download/$release_version/v-sekai-godot-templates.zip.001\"; $templates_sha256 = '23ED4620BB1A4BDBD786A697D7DFE5D68047CC2BE708FD4273E126A4146EDA42'; $templates_file_001 = \"$temp_dir\v-sekai-godot-templates.zip.001\"; Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $templates_url -OutFile $templates_file_001; $hash = Get-FileHash $templates_file_001 -Algorithm SHA256; if ($hash.Hash -ne $templates_sha256) { throw 'Templates hash mismatch' }; $templates_combined = \"$temp_dir\v-sekai-godot-templates.zip\"; Copy-Item $templates_file_001 $templates_combined; $symbols_url_001 = \"https://github.com/V-Sekai/world-godot/releases/download/$release_version/v-sekai-godot-templates-symbols.zip.001\"; $symbols_sha256_001 = '6D7FDB0AD410D1442987829259DA8550F33AED69E05CDA6842273E6A50A81E07'; $symbols_file_001 = \"$temp_dir\v-sekai-godot-templates-symbols.zip.001\"; Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $symbols_url_001 -OutFile $symbols_file_001; $hash = Get-FileHash $symbols_file_001 -Algorithm SHA256; if ($hash.Hash -ne $symbols_sha256_001) { throw 'Symbols 001 hash mismatch' }; $symbols_url_002 = \"https://github.com/V-Sekai/world-godot/releases/download/$release_version/v-sekai-godot-templates-symbols.zip.002\"; $symbols_sha256_002 = 'CA576C75AAB6413ABA180A831B92ACDF880E1496C63789BB5B3285488BF6A0FC'; $symbols_file_002 = \"$temp_dir\v-sekai-godot-templates-symbols.zip.002\"; Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $symbols_url_002 -OutFile $symbols_file_002; $hash = Get-FileHash $symbols_file_002 -Algorithm SHA256; if ($hash.Hash -ne $symbols_sha256_002) { throw 'Symbols 002 hash mismatch' }; $symbols_combined = \"$temp_dir\v-sekai-godot-templates-symbols.zip\"; $content1 = [System.IO.File]::ReadAllBytes($symbols_file_001); $content2 = [System.IO.File]::ReadAllBytes($symbols_file_002); $combined = $content1 + $content2; [System.IO.File]::WriteAllBytes($symbols_combined, $combined); $extract_temp = \"$temp_dir\extract\"; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $extract_temp -Force; Expand-Archive -Path $templates_combined -DestinationPath $extract_temp; Expand-Archive -Path $symbols_combined -DestinationPath $extract_temp; $tpz = Get-ChildItem $extract_temp -Filter *.tpz -Recurse | Select-Object -First 1; if ($tpz) { Expand-Archive -Path $tpz.FullName -DestinationPath $extract_temp }; $version_file = Get-ChildItem $extract_temp -Filter version.txt -Recurse | Select-Object -First 1; if ($version_file) { $template_version = Get-Content $version_file.FullName -Raw; $template_version = $template_version.Trim() } else { throw 'Could not find version.txt' }; $templates_dir = \"$base_templates_dir\$template_version\"; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $templates_dir -Force; Get-ChildItem $extract_temp -Recurse | Where-Object { -not $_.PSIsContainer } | ForEach-Object { $target = $_.FullName.Replace($extract_temp, $templates_dir); $target_dir = Split-Path $target; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $target_dir -Force; Move-Item $_.FullName $target -Force }; $version_txt_path = \"$templates_dir\version.txt\"; if (-not (Test-Path $version_txt_path)) { Set-Content $version_txt_path $template_version }; Remove-Item $temp_dir -Recurse -Force"
